item.description:
Conspiracy Cafe on the web

Every 2 weeks Boston 911 Truth holds a Conspiracy Cafe - a partly social, partly educational, partly action-oriented event.

Location: the Democracy Center, 45 Mt. Auburn Street, Harvard...

Beaucoup books, DVD's and bumper stickers for sale at the book table!

In the video lounge:

12 Noon: 911; The Myth and the Reality, David Ray Griffin

2:00 PM: 9/11 Mysteries (Demolitions), Sophia

4:05 PM: Kill the Messenger (about Sibel Edmonds, whistleblower)

5:05 PM: Money As Debt (Animation)

6:15 PM: Fiat Empire

One FREE documentary DVD for each attender

-----
Carpooling details:

Concord and Northern: Exit 17 Park and Ride lot; time: 1PM

Manchester: Murphy's Tap Room lot - 1:45PM

Nashua: Exit 6 Visitor's Center lot - 2:30PM

(If we are late at these stops, please be patient. We're working on developing a schedule that works. If you're at the stop and wondering if we're still coming, call 233-1058 or 828-8306)
item.name: Conspiracy Cafe
